text:
GetButik | Backend (Team lead) Engineer: Php + Java | Zurich | EU passport only

This might be a well-paid opportunity as we look for someone who can take over most of our CTO's responsibilities. Read more about the life quality in Zurich here:

https://medium.com/@iwaninzurich/eight-reasons-why-i-moved-t...

We revolutionize point of sales for small and medium size business and we run a SaaS app that connects our iPad POS system with webhops.

Hiring process:

- Resume / code-check

- Phone call (getting to know each other)

- Onsite day (half a day)

Send a mail to:

hiring@getbutik.tech
